content:
Below is result, no adjusting scripts.
>>> import subprocess
>>>
>>> try:
...     output = subprocess.run(["cmd.exe", "/c", "gcloud.cmd", "--version"], check=True, capture_output=True, text=True)
...     print("✅ gcloud is working inside Python!", output.stdout)
... except FileNotFoundError:
...     print("❌ gcloud is still NOT found in Python.")
...
✅ gcloud is working inside Python! Google Cloud SDK 513.0.0
bq 2.1.14
core 2025.02.28
gcloud-crc32c 1.0.0
gsutil 5.33

>>>
